pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatically Create a 'Shiny' App Based on Interactive 'Loon' Widgets // Package 'shiny' provides interactive web applications in R. Package 'loon' is an interactive toolkit engaged in open-ended, creative and unscripted data exploration. The 'loon.shiny' package can take 'loon' widgets and display a selfsame 'shiny' app.
